Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.i5Xz1hjImCHirF7l]{Machine Gun Specialist}

Benefits

When targeting an adjacent opponent with an LMG or GPMG the character takes no ranged attack penalties.

Normal

When using a machine gun against an adjacent opponent, the character takes a -6 penalty on all ranged attacks.
